name: Photos Legacy Video Project Backup
summary: A VPB file is a backup of a video project created in Microsoft Photos' Video Editor (which was included with previous versions of the program). It contains an exact copy of the video project's data, including a copy of the videos, photos, and other media the project includes. You can import a VPB file into the Legacy version of Microsoft Photos to view and edit the project it contains.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
